snippet: When Bristol City demolished its East Stand, Ben Swift was granted one side of Ashton Gate, the club’s stadium, to himself. Now he has a free, mostly unobstructed view, at least temporarily.
abstract: British man Ben Swift is, at least temporarily, enjoying an unobstructed view of Bristol City soccer games from the roof of his shed adjacent to Ashton Gate stadium; opportunity came after Bristol City demolished its dilapidated East Stand, clearing view from Swift's home.
lead_paragraph: When Bristol City demolished its East Stand, Ben Swift was granted one side of Ashton Gate, the club’s stadium, to himself. Now he has a free, mostly unobstructed view, at least temporarily.

headline.seo: East End Shed Man Enjoys a Mostly Unobstructed View at Bristol City F.C.
headline.main: At Stadium in His Backyard, He Stands Alone
headline.print_headline: Fan’s Shed Comes With Stadium View
